statements.select: SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName , AA.MenuID , AA.ViewID , AA.Parameter FROM dbo.TMenuView AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName , AA.MenuID , AA.ViewID , AA.Parameter FROM dbo.TMenuView AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.MenuID = #MenuID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TMenuView ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, MenuID, ViewID, Parameter ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #MenuID#, #ViewID#, #Parameter# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TMenuView SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName= #UpdatedByName#
, MenuID = #MenuID# , ViewID = #ViewID# , Parameter = #Parameter# WHERE ID = #ID#
